``` ::: ::: ::: ![image.png](attachment:image.png) ::: {#5fe1e04b .cell execution_count=40} ``` {.python .cell-code} def ddim_step(x_t, t, noise, abar_t, abar_t1, bbar_t, bbar_t1, eta): vari = ((bbar_t1/bbar_t) * (1-abar_t/abar_t1)) sig = vari.sqrt()*eta x_0_hat = ((x_t-bbar_t.sqrt()*noise) / abar_t.sqrt()) x_t = abar_t1.sqrt()*x_0_hat + (bbar_t1-sig**2).sqrt()*noise if t>0: x_t += sig * torch.randn(x_t.shape).to(x_t) return x_t ``` ::: ::: {#59e808db .cell execution_count=41} ``` {.python .cell-code} @torch.no_grad() def sample(f, model, sz, n_steps, skips=1, eta=1.): tsteps = list(reversed(range(0, n_steps, skips))) x_t = torch.randn(sz).to(model.device) preds = [] for i,t in enumerate(progress_bar(tsteps)): abar_t1 = abar[tsteps[i+1]] if t > 0 else torch.tensor(1) noise = model(x_t,t).sample x_t = f(x_t, t, noise, abar[t], abar_t1, 1-abar[t], 1-abar_t1, eta) preds.append(x_t.float().cpu()) return preds ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ::: {.ansi-escaped-output} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: ## Triangular noise ::: {#27536d85 .cell execution_count=45} ``` {.python .cell-code} def noisify(x0, ): device = x0.device n = len(x0) t = torch.randint(0, n_steps, (n,), dtype=torch.long) t = np.random.triangular(0, 0.5, 1, (n,))*n_steps t = tensor(t, dtype=torch.long) = torch.randn(x0.shape, device=device) _t = [t].reshape(-1, 1, 1, 1).to(device) xt = _t.sqrt()*x0 + (1-_t).sqrt()* return (xt, t.to(device)), ``` ::: ::: {#947b36e2 .cell execution_count=46} ``` {.python .cell-code} (xt,t), = noisify(xb,abar) plt.hist(t); ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ::: {.ansi-escaped-output} ```{=html}
